title: xArm-6 Viewer
alt: a smooth white robotic arm with multiple articulation
desc:
This model will be part of a dashboard for real-time monitoring of a robotic arm.
This team project is lead within the De Vinci Innovation Center.

title: History Reconstitution
alt: the medieval building site of a cathedral
desc:
This web player builds 360Â° scenes of historical places and times.
This work belongs to Histovery, a french agency rewarded in cultural heritage and digital innovation for its cross-reality experiences.

title: CH3SS
alt: 3D chess pieces are aligned, floating in a cosmic environment
desc:
This work is an attempt of a three dimensional, multitplayer chess game.
This is an ongoing pet project, rules and assets are all original based designs.
